content: Singaporean actress **Margaret Lee Mui Lin** (born 24 May 1970) is a former [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) actress. Lee was a [Mediacorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) full-time actress from 1990 to 2000 and from 2003 to 2009. ## Career ### Media Lee entered the entertainment industry after placing second to [Chew Chor Meng](/wiki/Chew_Chor_Meng) in the [Star Search](/wiki/Star_Search_Singapore) competition held in year 1990. Lee first appeared in an episode of the Singapore comedy serial *Modern Romance* as a vampish model. In 1992, she played a kind and caring nurse in *Breaking Point*, alongside critically acclaimed stars [Li Nanxing](/wiki/Li_Nanxing) and [Huang Biren](/wiki/Huang_Biren). In 1995, she starred in the [television film](/wiki/Television_film) *To Madam With Love*. In the following year, she starred in the television film *The Night is Young*. Lee left [Singapore Broadcasting Corporation](/wiki/Singapore_Broadcasting_Corporation) (SBC) in 1998 after her contract ended. After five years, Lee returned to [Mediacorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) in 2003. Her most notable role was in the drama *[Holland V](/wiki/Holland_V_(TV_series))* (2003), where she played as an irresponsible mother who leaves her daughter in the care of the Mo family. She has also starred in a number of local movies, such as *[The Best Bet](/wiki/The_Best_Bet)* (2004) and *[I Do, I Do](/wiki/I_Do,_I_Do_(film))* (2005) which were directed by [Jack Neo](/wiki/Jack_Neo). Lee was also managed by J-Team, headed by Neo. Lee also starred in a local sitcom series known as *[Police & Thief](/wiki/Police_%26_Thief)* from 2004 to 2008 in Seasons 1 to 5 before leaving the entertainment industry again to focus on her own business and personal life and she was then replaced by Sharon Wong in the final season being Season 6 in 2010. In July 2004, Lee appeared on the cover of FHM Singapore. ### Other After leaving SBC in 1998, Lee went into sales and insurance. ## Personal life Lee was born in [Hougang](/wiki/Hougang) and is a [Catholic](/wiki/Catholic_Church). She speaks the [Teochew](/wiki/Teochew_dialect) dialect and attended [CHIJ St Joseph's Convent](/wiki/CHIJ_St_Joseph%27s_Convent). She was married in 1993 and divorced in 1998. ## Filmography ### Film YearTitleRoleNotesRef1995 *To Madam With Love* (老师的情人)JoeyTelemovie1996*The Night is Young* (美丽夜女郎)WendyTelemovie2004*[The Best Bet](/wiki/The_Best_Bet)*Susan2005*[I Do, I Do](/wiki/I_Do,_I_Do_(film))* ### Television series YearTitleRoleNotesRef1991*Behind Bars* 铁狱雷霆May*Golden Shenton Way* 金色珊顿道Tang Shiliu *Black Phoenix* 黑凤凰Yang Yuanting1992*Modern Romance* 男欢女爱Linda*Breaking Point* 暴风边缘Ma Simin *Crazy Chase* 富贵也疯狂Chen Xiuzhu *Terms of Endearment* 戏剧人生Ma Qianyi1993*Angel of Vengeance* 暴雨狂花Chu Hong *The Brave One* 荡寇英雄Zhao Zifen1994 *Bond of Love* 情网Luo Qingling *Thunder Plot* 惊天大阴谋Xie Xueli *Larceny of Love* 雌雄大盗Qiu Yu *Against All Odds* 共闯荆途Gu Xiyang *Love At Last* 真心男儿Song Anqi1996 *Triumph Over The Green* 爱拼球会赢Long Fengzhu *Marriage, Dollars and Sense* 5C老公Hu Xiwen1997*[The Silver Lining](/wiki/The_Silver_Lining_(TV_series))*Lin Xianping *Playing to Win* Uncle当自强Yang Baobao *Not The Facts – Twin Doubt* 迷离剧场 之《永不停止的乐章》Anne1998 *Legend of the Crow* 乌丫传说Lan Xiang2000 *On the Frontline* 穿梭生死线Nana2003*[Holland V](/wiki/Holland_V_(TV_series))*2005*[My Lucky Charm](/wiki/My_Lucky_Charm)**[A New Life](/wiki/A_New_Life_(Singaporean_TV_series))*Xiaoyan2004-2008*[Police & Thief](/wiki/Police_%26_Thief)*Mrs Lily Lee - Margaret Lee at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. title: Margaret Lee (Singaporean actress)
